labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to the SOA Cloud Service Integration workshop

labs.title: Lab 100: SOACS Provisioning and Overview
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to provision SOACS and review the details of Oracle Cloud Portal with an existing SOACS instance.

labs.title: Lab 200: ValidatePayment Composite Development and Deployment
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to build a 'ValidatePayment' web service and deploy it using Enterprise Manager.

labs.title: Lab 300: SOACS composite applications Deployment from Oracle JDeveloper
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to deploy the 'ValidatePayment' web service to SOA Cloud Service from Oracle JDeveloper.
